LanguageData.VFES_DeployDesc: Deploy the structure from the submerged state.
LanguageData.VFES_SubmergeDesc: Submerge the structure into the ground, making it much harder for it to take damage.
LanguageData.VFES_DesignatorRearmTraps_Description: Designate traps to be rearmed by colonists.
LanguageData.VFES_SetWorldTargetDesc: Set the target on the world map for the artillery to fire at. Shots fired over the world map are less accurate. Can only fire at revealed locations.
LanguageData.VFES_ArtilleryNeedsVisibleMap: Artillery needs to target a visible, explored map.
LanguageData.VFES_ArtilleryInvalidFiringMode: Artillery cannot fire in this direction.
LanguageData.VFES_ArtilleryInvalidGroundToSpace: Artillery cannot fire from planet to space.
LanguageData.VFES_ArtilleryInvalidSpaceToSpace: Artillery cannot fire from space to space.
LanguageData.VFES_ArtilleryInvalidSpaceToGround: Artillery cannot fire from space to ground.
LanguageData.VFES_ArtilleryInvalidGroundToGround: Artillery cannot fire from ground to ground
